this is a fun book i found, which anyone with an interest in bushido 
and likes dogs should enjoy.  [my mutt is 14 and my fifth]

"Samurai Bulldog" by Chibinosuke Dogizaemon, as told to Jeff Hunter

ISBN 0-8348-0305-4

The drawing of the battle of Sakekahara [sp] is a riot of samurai 
bulldogs with katana, naginata, yumi, etc.  Great fun stuff!!

doug e.
